races.name: Human
races.description: Versatile and stubbornly resilient, humans show up everywhere there's trouble or opportunity.
races.playstyle_hint: Flexible "default" choice that fits any class or build.

races.name: Elf
races.description: Graceful and long-lived, elves are keen-eyed wanderers with a deep connection to magic and the wilds.
races.playstyle_hint: Great for agile, perceptive, or magic-leaning builds.

races.name: Dwarf
races.description: Stout, stubborn, and tough as bedrock, dwarves are hardy folk who thrive in the thick of danger.
races.playstyle_hint: Excellent for frontline or tanky characters.

races.name: Halfling
races.description: Small in stature but big in luck, halflings slip through danger with a smile and a good story.
races.playstyle_hint: Ideal for rogues, ranged, or "lucky survivor" types.

races.name: Gnome
races.description: Curious tinkerers and oddball arcanists, gnomes can't resist poking the strange glowing thing.
races.playstyle_hint: Fits inventive casters, support, and trickster builds.

races.name: Orc
races.description: Fierce and driven, orcs channel raw strength and willpower into whatever path they choose.
races.playstyle_hint: Great for high-POW bruisers or intense support roles.

races.name: Goblin
races.description: Scrappy, fast, and a little unhinged, goblins survive on nerve, speed, and questionable ideas.
races.playstyle_hint: Fun for chaotic, agile, or "gremlin energy" builds.

races.name: Dragonborn
races.description: Scaled warriors with a hint of dragon's fire in their blood and a talent for dramatic entrances.
races.playstyle_hint: Good for flashy frontline or battle-mage characters.

races.name: Catfolk
races.description: Feline humanoids who move with quiet grace and sharp curiosity.
races.playstyle_hint: Great for rogues, rangers, and agile casters.

races.name: Birdfolk
races.description: Winged or feathered humanoids with keen eyes and a love of high vantage points.
races.playstyle_hint: Ideal for scouts, archers, and perceptive mystics.

races.name: Fae
races.description: Otherworldly beings touched by older magic, half in this world and half in another.
races.playstyle_hint: Suits trickster casters, enchanters, and social characters.

races.name: Revenant
races.description: Once dead but called back by purpose, revenants carry a lingering chill and an unfinished story.
races.playstyle_hint: Great for tough, stubborn, or spooky builds (warriors, warlocks, clerics).
